CustomField.description: Have you personally inspected the Third-Party Ladder from top to bottom for defects or weaknesses? (Consider: top caps, rails, rungs/steps, check for cracks, bends, damage; locking mechanism and strand hooks on extension ladders; spreader bars and hinges on step ladders; rivets, bolts; and finally, feet/bases for damage or wear.)"?
CustomField.label: ThirdParty Ladder Inspected
